summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1828, for the improvement of Twelfth Avenue West, from Grand Boulevard to Nickerson Street; and Grand Boulevard, from Twelfth Avenue West to Thirteenth Avenue West, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing water mains therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary gates, tees, crosses for the reasonable water service of said district, under Ordinance No. 19020 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
